name: plan
human_readbale_description: Service for planning the creation and execution of a process

intentions: When I want to plan and schedule the completion of a process
Which may include any of the $requirements
Then I want the AI assistant to be able to build a plan for the process
And I want the AI assistant to reflect using the $connectors
And I want the AI assistant to be able to test the plan using the $capabilities
Then execute or scrap the plan based on the results before the process is executed
use_case_prompts: The user wants to plan and schedule the completion of a task
The user wants to test a planned process and gather data on the results
The user wants to reflect on a previously planned process and refine the plan based on the results for execution of another process
The user wants to build a plan for a process, but not execute it yet
